articles.description: 'Stefania' was written as a tribute to a band member's mother, but has transformed into a war anthem since Russia's invasion. The song stormed to victory at Eurovision song contest.
articles.content: Footage has emerged of a defiant Ukrainian soldier at Mariupol's Azovstal steel plant singing a rendition of the Eurovision-winning song 'Stefania', even as the explosions of Russian bombs thundered … [+5912 chars]

articles.title: American Idol: Leah Marlene falls down in disbelief after making the final three on ABC singing show - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 20-year-old singer from Normal, Illinois, fell down in disbelief on Sunday's episode of American Idol as she made the final three on the ABC singing competition show.
articles.content:

articles.description: The BBMAs host proclaimed, “I’m here to forgive, to unify, to celebrate, and to have everybody be free.”

articles.title: SNL: Selena Gomez IMPERSONATES Miley Cyrus, Jokes About Dating - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Selena Gomez pokes fun at herself and old pal Miley Cyrus in her 'Saturday Night Live' hosting debut.
